title: The Introduction of Polaroid Color Stripes, 1968
content:
Oh, I know you're bored by now. It was such a long time ago -- in the olden times my kids would say. However, just in case you want to date the advent of color stripes in packaging, which Eastman Kodak followed when they introduced their instant color film, here's the story at my blog link:   
   
 [http://giam.typepad.com/the\_branding\_of\_polaroid\_/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019152849/http:/giam.typepad.com/the_branding_of_polaroid_/) ![Polaroid Colorpack camera and film, 1968](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019152849im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/40575.jpg)
author: giam
